item.title: Want to start a venture? - Do Things that don't scale
item.description: Want to start a venture? - Do Things that don't scale

item.title: How to get startup ideas?
item.description:
How to get startup ideas?

The way to get startup ideas is not to try to think of startup ideas. It's to look for problems, preferably problems you have yourself. The very best startup ideas tend to have three things in common: they're something the founders themselves want, that they themselves can build, and that few others realize are worth doing. Microsoft, Apple, Yahoo, Google, and Facebook all began this way.

item.title: 20 Most Inspiring Design Blogs
item.description:
20 Most Inspiring Design Blogs

1,004 Views December 17, 2015 Vilnius, Lithuania Design 2 min read During the past few year of freelancing, I was working with many of design blogs and magazines. I've had great experience writing for them and working together. Most of the time my job was to write the articles about design, technology or tools.
